text: Carl L. Ford (born July 11, 1957) is a Republican member of the North Carolina Senate representing the 33rd district. He previously represented the 76th district in the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/114823/carl- ford#.VWu-K2TBzGc ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:People from Kannapolis, North Carolina Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1957 births
title: Carl Ford (politician)
